questions.question_text: “...jene Bhagwānnī prāpti thaī chhe ane gṛuhasthāshramī chhe to paṇ te nirguṇ kahevāy ane tyāgī hoy te paṇ nirguṇ kahevāy.”
questions.explanation: This quote is directly from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 8.

questions.question_text: "...gṛuhī-tyāgīno kāī meḷ nathī, jenī samajaṇ moṭī tene ja sauthī moṭo _____ _____."
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is: “...gṛuhī-tyāgīno kāī meḷ nathī, jenī samajaṇ moṭī tene ja sauthī moṭo haribhakta jāṇavo.”

questions.question_text: “...jene māhātmye sahit nishchay hoy tene em samajāy je, ‘Je divase Bhagwānnu darshan thayu te divasthī ja kalyāṇ to thaī rahyu chhe ane je jīv bhāve karīne māru darshan kare tathā māru vachan māne tenu paṇ kalyāṇ thaī jāy to māre kalyāṇno shyo sanshay chhe? Hu to kṛutārth chhu ane je kāī sādhan karu chhu te to Bhagwānnī prasannatāne arthe karu chhu,’ em samaje tene Bhagwānno māhātmye sahit nishchay jāṇavo.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 72.

questions.question_text: "Atishay je _____ Puruṣh hoy teno je upar rājīpo thāy tenā game tevā malin sanskār hoy to nāsh pāme ane Moṭā Puruṣhno rājīpo thayo hoy to rānk hoy te rājā thāy ane game tevā bhūnḍā prārabdha hoy to rūḍā thāy ane game tevu tene māthe vighna āvanāru hoy te nāsh thaī jāy."
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is: "Atishay je Moṭā Puruṣh hoy teno je upar rājīpo thāy tenā game tevā malin sanskār hoy to nāsh pāme ane Moṭā Puruṣhno rājīpo thayo hoy to rānk hoy te rājā thāy ane game tevā bhūnḍā prārabdha hoy to rūḍā thāy ane game tevu tene māthe vighna āvanāru hoy te nāsh thaī jāy."

questions.question_text: "Jene potānu kalyāṇ ichchhavu tene to Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sādhu ethī uparānt bīju kāī jagatmā sukhdāyī nathī."
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada অন্ত্য 7.

questions.question_text: "...amāro draḍh vishvās rākhasho ne kahīe tem karasho to tamane mahākaṣhṭ koīk āvī paḍashe tethī athavā sāt dakālī jevu paḍashe te thakī _____ karashu ane koī ūgaryāno āro na hoy evu kaṣhṭ āvī paḍashe toy paṇ rakṣhā karashu."
questions.explanation: The quote is from Vachanamrut Jetalpur 5.

questions.question_text: "Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja kalyāṇkārī chhe."
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 59.

questions.question_text: "Jene _____ ne santno māhātmya-gnāne sahit nishchay hoy..."
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is: "Jene Bhagwānno ne santno māhātmya-gnāne sahit nishchay hoy..."

questions.question_text: "Bhagwānnā santnī sevā to bahu moṭā puṇyavāḷāne maḷe."
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 59.

questions.question_text: "...satpuruṣhno āsharo kare tyāre game tevo pāpī hoy to paṇ ati _____ thaī jāy chhe..."
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is: "...satpuruṣhno āsharo kare tyāre game tevo pāpī hoy to paṇ ati pavitra thaī jāy chhe..."

questions.question_text: "Bhagwān ane Moṭā Sādhune āshare karīne to vādaḷ jevā dukh āvavānā hoy te paṇ ṭaḷī jāy ne sādhan karīne to kūṭī kūṭīne marī jāy to paṇ na ṭaḷe."
questions.explanation: This quote is from Swamini Vato 1/114.

questions.question_text: "Satpuruṣhne viṣhe draḍh prīti e ja ātmadarshannu sāadhan chhe ane satpuruṣhno mahimā jāṇyānu paṇ e ja sāadhan chhe ane Parameshvarnu sākṣhāt darshan thāvānu paṇ e ja sāadhan chhe."
questions.explanation: The correct answer is Vachanamrut Vadtal 11.

questions.question_text: "Āvī Bhagwatswarūp sambandhī je vārtā te to shāstramāthī paṇ potānī meḷe samajāy nahī; ane sadgranthomā āvī vārtā to hoy, paṇ jyāre satpuruṣh pragaṭ thāy chhe tyāre temnā _____ thakī ja vāt samajāymā āve chhe, paṇ potānī buddhi-baḷe karīne sadgranthomāthī paṇ samajātī nathī."
questions.explanation: The correct sentence is: Āvī Bhagwatswarūp sambandhī je vārtā te to shāstramāthī paṇ potānī meḷe samajāy nahī; ane sadgranthomā āvī vārtā to hoy, paṇ jyāre satpuruṣh pragaṭ thāy chhe tyāre temnā mukh thakī ja vāt samajāymā āve chhe, paṇ potānī buddhi-baḷe karīne sadgranthomāthī paṇ samajātī nathī.

questions.question_text: "Swadharma, gnān, vairāgya ane māhātmyagnān teṇe sahit je Bhagwānnī bhakti teṇe yukta evā je Bhagwānnā Ekāntik Sādhu tenā prasang thakī Bhāgwat Dharmanu poṣhaṇ thāy chhe ane vaḷī jīvne mokṣhanu je dvār te paṇ evā Sādhunā prasang thakī ughāḍu thāy chhe."
questions.explanation: This quote comes directly from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 54.

questions.question_text: "jene _____ dharmamā sthiti thaī hoy te thakī ja ekāntikno dharma pamāy chhe."
questions.explanation: The correct sentence is: "jene ekāntiknā dharmamā sthiti thaī hoy te thakī ja ekāntikno dharma pamāy chhe."

questions.question_text: "je brahmarūp thayo tene ja Puruṣhottamnī bhaktino adhikār chhe."
questions.explanation: This quote comes directly from Vachanamrut Loya 7.

questions.question_text: "aṣhṭāvarṇe yukta evā je koṭi koṭi brahmānḍ te je Akṣharne viṣhe aṇunī peṭhe jaṇāy chhe, evu je Puruṣhottam Nārāyaṇnu dhāmrūp Akṣhar te rūpe pote rahyo thako Puruṣhottamnī upāsanā kare, tene uttam _____ _____ kahīe."
questions.explanation: The correct sentence is: aṣhṭāvarṇe yukta evā je koṭi koṭi brahmānḍ te je Akṣharne viṣhe aṇunī peṭhe jaṇāy chhe, evu je Puruṣhottam Nārāyaṇnu dhāmrūp Akṣhar te rūpe pote rahyo thako Puruṣhottamnī upāsanā kare, tene uttam nirvikalp nishchayvāḷo kahīe.

questions.question_text: "Koṭi janme kasar ṭaḷavānī hoy te āj ṭaḷī jāy ne brahmarūp karī mūke, jo kharekharā sādhu maḷe ne te kahe tem kare to."
questions.explanation: The quote is from Swamini Vato 1/119.

questions.question_text: "Sant kṛupāe _____ ūpaje, sant kṛupāthī sare kām; Sant kṛupāthī pāmīe, Pūraṇ Puruṣhottam Dhām."
questions.explanation: The verse is: Sant kṛupāe sukh ūpaje, sant kṛupāthī sare kām; Sant kṛupāthī pāmīe, Pūraṇ Puruṣhottam Dhām.

questions.question_text: "Sant kṛupāe sadmati jāge, sant kṛupāthī sadguṇ; Sant kṛupā vinā _____, kahone pāmyā kuṇ."
questions.explanation: The verse is: Sant kṛupāe sadmati jāge, sant kṛupāthī sadguṇ; Sant kṛupā vinā sādhutā, kahone pāmyā kuṇ.
